headline: Campbell’s Sovos Deal Puts Snacks Growth And Integration Risks In Focus
summary: Campbell Soup Company (NasdaqGS:CPB) has completed its acquisition of Sovos Brands, adding Rao’s pasta sauces and other packaged foods to its portfolio. The deal is aimed at expanding Campbell’s presence in higher growth, branded meals and snacks while it works to integrate Sovos into its existing operations. Investors are watching how the Sovos acquisition affects Campbell’s snacks segment and overall product mix, as well as potential integration risks and costs. Campbell operates across...
